name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Daniel Paul CHRISTMAN, Petitioner
docket_number: Petition No. 651 Middle District Alloc. Dkt. 1999

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Daniel Paul CHRISTMAN, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 13th day of December, 1999, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED and the order of the Superior Court is REVERSED. Commonwealth v. Lantzy, 558 Pa. 214, 736 A.2d 564 (1999).
IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that this matter be remanded to the PCRA court for an evidentiary hearing on the reasons for counsel’s failure to file a timely brief on Petitioner’s direct appeal to the Superior Court.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Edward F. Browne, Jr., Lancaster, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
741 A.2d 197
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Daniel Paul CHRISTMAN, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 13, 1999.
Edward F. Browne, Jr., Lancaster, for petitioner.
